hadith.arabic-text: حدثني عمرو بن علي، حدثنا معاذ بن هانئ، حدثنا همام، حدثنا قتادة، عن أنس بن مالك،‏.‏
hadith.english-text: Narrated Abu Huraira: The Prophet had big feet and a good-looking face and l have not seen anybody like him after him. Narrated Anas: The Prophet had big feet and hands. Narrated Anas or Jabir bin `Abdullah The Prophet had big hands and feet and I have not seen anybody like him after him.
